services.description: Custom responsive websites with up to 5 pages, basic SEO, and deployment.
Online stores with product catalog (up to 50 items), secure payment gateways, and inventory management.
Tailored web applications (e.g., dashboards, booking systems) with full-stack development and API integration.
Regular updates, backups, and security monitoring. Monthly plans available (Basic or Premium).
Improve website ranking with keyword research, speed optimization, and analytics setup.
Intuitive, user-friendly designs including wireframes, mockups, and usability testing.
Expert advice on frameworks, coding best practices, and performance optimization.
Enhance page load speed, code efficiency, and server performance.

add_ons_and_packages.description: Each extra page added to a website project.
Implement multi-language functionality for e-commerce or websites.
Add more products to your e-commerce catalog beyond the initial setup.
Includes a 5-page website, basic SEO, and one month of support.
Discount for ongoing projects or retainer agreements.
